title: Jack Nicklaus on the ever-evolving Augusta National
brightcove_name: Jack Nicklaus on the ever-evolving Augusta National
brightcove_short_desc: Through the growth of golf technology, Jack Nicklaus believes Augusta National has remained a top course that still challenges the world's best players. Nicklaus is hopeful Tiger Woods will return to the game and continue his success.
brightcove_ramp_keywords: Tiger Woods,Augusta National,Jack Nicklaus,The Dan Patrick Show,Augusta,Dan Patrick,Sam Snead,United States
headline: Jack Nicklaus on the ever-evolving Augusta National
short_headline: Jack Nicklaus on the ever-evolving Augusta National

slug: Jack Nicklaus on the ever-evolving Augusta National
body: Through the growth of golf technology, Jack Nicklaus believes Augusta National has remained a top course that still challenges the world's best players. Nicklaus is hopeful Tiger Woods will return to the game and continue his success.
